# floatingPointClass

**Instance Property**

The classification of this value.

## Declaration

```swift
var floatingPointClass: FloatingPointClassification { get }
```

## Discussion

A value’s `floatingPointClass` property describes its “class” as described by the [http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/servlet/opac?punumber=4610933].
